summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the proposed South Lake Union Streetcar; reducing an appropriation in the Seattle Department of Transportation's 2004 Adopted Budget; reappropriating that money to the Legislative Department for a Special Benefit Study for a potential Local Improvement District; and transferring cash to support the reappropriation.
sponsor: LICATA, CONLIN, GODDEN, RASMUSSEN, STEINBRUECK, DELLA
